title: Spinach and Bacon Quiche
subtitle: Paula Deen
description: A savory quiche layered with spinach, crispy bacon, and Swiss cheese, bound together with a creamy egg custard.
steps: Beat eggs, heavy cream, salt, and pepper together.
Place chopped spinach, crumbled bacon, and Swiss cheese in the bottom of prepared pie crust.
Pour egg mixture over the filling.
Bake for 35–45 minutes until custard is set and golden.
Let quiche rest briefly before slicing into 8 wedges.
notes: This recipe is inspired by Paula Deen’s version shared on PaulaDeen.com; it’s crowd‑pleasing and easy to customize with your favorite cheese.
